title: When the Minions get a clutch last hit, giving you the kill.

replies.body:
Hey, you're RaptorKarr...

Shouldn't you be shipping the minions with somebody or something? :P
Blue Caster x Red Melee, tis a forbidden romance.
always knew those melees were hitting on the casters and that the casters were shooting signals.
Blue melee x Baron. Try getting that one out of your head.

But then they block you in the middle of them denying you a kill 5 minutes later.

*WINIIIIOOONNNSSSSSSSSSSSS*

When your team gets aced, and the enemy team has 4 people pushing like hell down mid lane, getting to your Nexus and bringing it down to double digits just before the camera pans to THEIR nexus, surrounded by a wet dream mass of minions (including at least a dozen supers).

Winions doing work.

Instead of you last hitting the minions.

__The minions are last hitting you__
